description:
Szayel Aporro has analyzed Uryu`s and Renji`s Spiritual Pressures and has sealed away most of their abilities. The two decide to work together. Uryu says that he has a plan if Renji can stall Szayel Aporro for twenty seconds. Renji agrees and charges in, but Szayel Aporro easily deflects Zabimaru`s attacks. Meanwhile, Ichigo has been defeated by Ulquiorra and has lost consciousness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ishida no Sakusen! Koubou no Nijuubyou
Ishida`s Strategy, the 20-second Offense and Defense
La stratégie d`Ishida, les 20 secondes d`attaque-défense
石田の作戦! 攻防の20秒
